/contracts/interfaces/IStakeLPCore.sol":{"keccak256":"0x6594e5b47cfd7d911705eeba5a82e6a28a4cb1e39851589f12183a6def33a849","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://617de8de4ced7318e76b5f0a406bc1655282776c9952031837d7aabe2bcee7af","dweb:/ipfs/QmZkRmd2w3JxF4VB2Zw6xYND1JBDteU5qfyEfs6LkvbvUR"]},"project:/contracts/interfaces/IUTokens.sol":{"keccak256":"0x55228ca4bc095bfbd585beffa46337a76f8fbf64c4ff38cd3e65928c435bdff3","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://1fac04fbc58959ed32978a9dd5d13e97484f56ecfd65a4f0a1a9fc31f1de64b9","dweb:/ipfs/QmWcVeoKx7MSRigo7TMEsjiFD6Jp2vSUDFhuw15TWYU494"]},"project:/contracts/libraries/FullMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0x70b80e2c68fb0af7f5c81ee5237eb8cf7d1bca5f567208291413db0da3a9a5b0","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://e0208690c8d44d29b440a77459daf57b8c9e4279001f91015eaed3b6a3ea48a0","dweb:/ipfs/QmRoDYULShJqCwKjYWnRYJ1DBaxNEmsk4nZm2Npnih3WqD"]},"project:/contracts/libraries/TransferHelper.sol":{"keccak256":"0x7363160f8d428f4734d9f8802e81aa2eea749c28683ee620e2088d3fe11c176d","license":"GPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://3ff2727e04bd4f0e99f0cc9be89d015729ebf8091ed5aa7d6e727a1dafd3c7ac","dweb:/ipfs/QmNPfN6bAmheyzSzcnM82pFBRHzmF5giJxGumuEusHHnGc"]}},"version":1}

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

getRoleMember(bytes32,uint256).details: Returns one of the accounts that have `role`. `index` must be a value between 0 and {getRoleMemberCount}, non-inclusive. Role bearers are not sorted in any particular way, and their ordering may change at any point. WARNING: When using {getRoleMember} and {getRoleMemberCount}, make sure you perform all queries on the same block. See the following https://forum.openzeppelin.com/t/iterating-over-elements-on-enumerableset-in-openzeppelin-contracts/2296[forum post] for more information.

getRoleMemberCount(bytes32).details: Returns the number of accounts that have `role`. Can be used together with {getRoleMember} to enumerate all bearers of a role.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

initialize(address,address,address,addre.details: Constructor for initializing the LiquidStaking contract.

params.pStakeAddress: - address of the pStake contract address.

pause().details: Triggers stopped state. Requirements: - The contract must not be paused.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

params.pstakeAddress: : pStake contract address Emits a {SetPSTAKEContract} event with '_contract' set to the stoken contract address.

params.sAddress: : stoken contract address Emits a {SetSTokensContract} event with '_contract' set to the stoken contract address.

params.uAddress: : utoken contract address Emits a {SetUTokensContract} event with '_contract' set to the utoken contract address.

unpause().details: Returns to normal state. Requirements: - The contract must be paused.
